Detailed Description

template<typename MATRIX, typename Func>
class component_wise_functor_0< MATRIX, Func >

COMPONENT WISE GENERIC FUNCTOR (NO ARGUMENTS) ///// This class is used as FUNCTOR for the templates located at matrixFloat_math_templates.h
